## jx compliance status

Retrieves the status of compliance tests

### Synopsis

Retrieves the current status of the compliance tests

```
jx compliance status [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Get the status
  jx compliance status
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for status
```
